kush.shapes

Class Shapes2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • kush.shapes.Shape
      • kush.shapes.Shapes2D
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, Rectangle

    public abstract class Shapes2D
extends Shape

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int color
      The color which is used to fill or border designated shape
      protected double x
      the x-coordinate which is used by all shapes
      protected double y
      the y-coordinate which is used by all shapes

      Constructor and Description
      Shapes2D(double x, double y)

    • Method Detail

      • isPointInside

        public abstract boolean isPointInside(double x,
                                      double y)
        This abstract method is used to determine whether a point is inside of a shape
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of the point which is to be checked
        y - y-coordinate of the point which is used to be checked
        Returns:
        returns true if the point (x,y) is inside the shape

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
        This method presets the border color, fill color, and the stroke thickness of the shape
        Parameters:
        drawer - the PApplet used to draw the rectangle

        This method returns the y-coordinate of the shape

        returns the y-coordinate of the shape

      • move

        public void move(double x,
                 double y)
        This method moves the Shape to the coordinates (x,y)
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate which replaces the original x-coordinate of the shape
        y - the y-coordinate which replaces the original y-coordinate of the shape

      • moveBy

        public void moveBy(double x,
                   double y)
        This method translates the coordinates of the shape by (x,y)
        Parameters:
        x - the amount of pixels added to the x-coordinate of the shape
        y - the amount of pixels added to the y-coordinate of the shape

      • setFill

        public void setFill(int r,
                    int g,
                    int b)
        This method fills in the shape given the RGB color code
        Parameters:
        r - the r value of the RGB color code
        g - the g value of the RGB color code
        b - the b value of the RGB color code
